about_the_game:
Unveil secrets, solve puzzles, and explore a captivating virtual world in this 2D mystery game.

Experience innovative gameplay mechanics centered around a searchbar interface that allows you to interact with the virtual world, search for clues, and uncover hidden truths. Prepare for mind-bending twists and surprises as the game breaks the fourth wall, blurring the lines between reality and the virtual world in unexpected ways.

Use the searchbar, database and camera feeds to solve a web of mysteries and conspiracies, concerning the missing Dr. Emily Hartley, an expert for comet impacts.

content_descriptors.notes: There might be some grotesque visuals of supernatural creatures (like in the trailer), but no blood, extreme violence, sex or drug abuse

Prepare for mind-bending twists and surprises as the game breaks the fourth wall, blurring the lines between reality and the virtual world in unexpected ways.

Use the searchbar, database and camera feeds to solve a web of mysteries and conspiracies, concerning the missing Dr. Emily Hartley, an expert for comet impacts.
name: Searchbar Detective

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Searchbar Detective is a 2D Mystery Game set in a virtual world in which you use your searchbar to solve crimes and uncover conspiracies.
